pages.text:
Our Artists
The creativity of our Artists
knows no bounds, and we're excited to showcase the very best across various disciplines at the
Fall Festival of the Arts - DeLand.
Whether it be a painting by our
2024 Featured Artist Stacia Hollmann,
or furniture, sculptures, jewelry,  print, and more from our over 160 juried artists, the masterpieces of each  will be available for purchase. This unique opportunity to view and acquire them all in one location comes once a year!
Here's an alphabetical list of who will be exhibiting with booth numbers.

John Canterbury - Photography

And here’s the featured piece,
Heritage of Time,
for the 2024 Fall Festival of the Arts in DeLand by our
Featured Artist,
Stacia Hollmann.
Stacia Hollmann, a mother of five based in DeLand, Florida, is a versatile artist known for her work in both two-dimensional and three-dimensional art forms. With a focus on photography, encaustic, and clay sculpture, Stacia presents her work in gallery shows and art festivals; winning awards in multiple juried shows.
Heritage of Time
will be featured on the 2024 poster and t-shirts.
Learn More
The heart of our festival is the artwork. You’ll find original work created by artists in a variety of mediums such as
Painting, Glass, Sculpture, Jewelry, Leather, Photography, Printmaking, Wood, Ceramics, Mixed Media, Fiber and more.
The festival is an opportunity for art lovers to meet the artists and to purchase works that will enrich their lives.
The Fall Festival of the Arts DeLand is presented in partnership with the Museum of Art - DeLand and MainStreet DeLand Association. Funding and support services are provided in part by the City of DeLand, County of Volusia, State of Florida Dept. of State and West Volusia Tourism Advertising Authority.
MEET OUR
2024 FESTIVAL JUDGES

INFO FOR ARTISTS
entertainment
Volunteer page
Sponsors page
PATRON PROGRAM

Join Our Festival
Celebrating its 32nd year,
The Fall Festival of the Arts - DeLand
, presented in cooperation with the
Museum of Art - DeLand and MainStreet DeLand Association
, is an exciting, juried fine art festival. The main street of the historic preservation district of downtown DeLand provides a charming backdrop for this annual festival which is dedicated to those who create as well as those who appreciate and collect art.
Apply to our 2024 Festival on ZAPP here.
We are proud to be DeLand’s only fine art juried Festival.
We have a tradition of 31 years in historic downtown DeLand.
Named “Best Outdoor Art Festival” by
Florida Living
Over
$60,000
available in
Judges' awards (including $4,000 Best of Show)
and
Patron/Collector purchase
awards
. Fine art exhibits presented by our juried artists, great music, and youth activities draw a crowd of more than
50,000
patrons
over the two day festival.
The DeLand community continues to support the Festival and its Artists through a
Patron/Collector Award Program.
Festival artists will have the opportunity to meet festival Patron/Collector members at the Artist Appreciation & Awards Event Saturday night. Generous purchases by our Art Festival Patrons/Collectors will add to sales and make this festival even more successful for you.
Apply to our 2024 Festival on ZAPP here.
Awards:
Best of Show 1 @ $4,000
2D Judge’s Choice 1 @ $2,500
3D Judge’s Choice 1 @ $2,500
Award of Excellence 2 @ $1,500
Award of Distinction 4 @ $1,000
Award of Merit 5 @ $750
Award of Recognition 6 @ $500
Honorable Mention 8 @ $300
Artist Amenities:
.
Artist Oasis Saturday and Sunday (includes breakfast and lunch each day)
Artist Appreciation & Awards Event on Saturday night (includes dinner)
Boothsitters
Easy load-in and load-out
Dedicated Artist parking areas
Complimentary link on the Fall Festival web site to the Artist’s website
Apply on ZApp

Drop us a line
Have a question about the Festival? Let us know through one of the ways listed below.
In case of an emergency during the festival, call 911.
For any other information during the festival, reach out our social media channels or call the festival office at 386-734-4371  ext. 102.
